tool.name: Paste Files Horizontally
tool.description: Join multiple files horizontally using paste

param.name: inputs
param.label: Select files to join
param.help: Select files to join horizontally. It is assumed that all files have an equal number of rows.

param.name: delimiter
param.label: Delimiter
param.help: Specify the delimiter to use when joining files (default is tab).

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark.
**What it does** This tool joins multiple files horizontally using the Unix `paste` command. Each input file should have the same number of rows.
